column4: i kinda gotta stupid question, but im kinda new to ubuntu, well it has to do with tha task manager..... wat gives tha highest priority -10, -5, 0, 5, 10   ?   ? ?   ?
the nice value to give maximum CPU is -20   but it will cause a tonne of stability issues
somewhere around -15 or -10 will be ok
then you can set the nice value at runtime with the nice command, or yu can renice your own processes (or other user's with sudo) using renice
